a11y.a-person-looking-at-an-empty-board: A person looking at an empty board
a11y.two-people-looking-in-an-empty-box: Two people looking in an empty box

admin.add-remove-manager-message: Are you sure you want to {isManager, select, true {add} other {remove}} this user as group manager?
admin.allow-public-lists-tooltip: Allow users to make a list public. Has no effect if the group is in 'Registry' mode.
admin.claims-name-tooltip: Show the name of the user who claimed the item on the item card.
admin.claims-require-email-tooltip: Require an email address to anonymously claim an item.
admin.clear-lists: Clear {groupSpecific, select, true {} other {All}} {claimedOnly, select, true {Claimed Items} other {Lists}}
admin.clear-lists-confirmation: Are you sure you wish to clear {claimedOnly, select, true {claimed items} other {all wishlists}} {groupSpecific, select, true {in this group} other {across all groups}}? This action is irreversible!
admin.default-group-tooltip: New users will be added to this group if they were not sent a group specific signup token.
admin.delete-group-message: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This will delete all lists in this group and any associated items not in another group. This action is irreversible!
admin.delete-user-confirmation: Are you sure you wish to delete {username}? This action is irreversible!
admin.disable-email-verification-description: Disable the requirement for user's email to be verified with the IdP for account linking and creation.
admin.disable-password-login-tooltip: Disables logging in with a password. Only Header and OAuth authentication will be allowed.
admin.enable-default-list-creation-tooltip: Enable the creation of a list when a new user joins a group. Users will still be able to create lists themselves.
admin.enable-sync-description: Enable syncing user attributes from your IdP such as name and email.
admin.oidc-auto-redirect-description: Automatically redirect to your IdP's sign in page.
admin.oidc-auto-redirect-tooltip: To bypass the automatic redirect, '?direct=1' can be added to the URL.
admin.oidc-auto-register-tooltip: Enables new account creation for OAuth users signing in for the first time.
admin.password-strength-requirement-tooltip: The minium required password strength for a user's password.
admin.password-strength-warning: Use caution when changing or disabling this value! If disabled, any password of 1 character or more will be allowed.
admin.profile-disabled: Your profile is managed by your OAuth provider.
admin.registry-mode-alert-text: This group is in Registry Mode. No additional members can be added in this mode. You can get a public link to your list on your list page.
admin.remove-member-message: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the group? This will delete all the user's lists in the group and any associated items that are not on another list. This action is irreversible!
admin.show-for-list-owner-description: Allow list owners to view claims on their own lists.
admin.suggestions-approval-required-tooltip: Item requires approval from the list owner. If approved, the list owner can see, modify, and delete the item.
admin.suggestions-auto-approve-tooltip: Item is automatically added to the list, but the list owner can see, modify, and delete the item.
admin.suggestions-surprise-me-tooltip: Item is automatically added to the list without the list owner knowing.
admin.suggestions-tooltip: Allow users within the same group to suggest items on another user's list.
admin.wishlist-mode-alert: There are {memberCount} members and {listCount} lists in this group, you cannot switch the mode until you remove all but one member and one list.
admin.wishlist-mode-display-text: In 'Wishlist' mode, you can have multiple users and lists and claim items from other users. In 'Registry' mode, you have a single list which you can publicly share.
admin.wishlist-mode-registry-tooltip: One user with one public list. Users from other groups can make suggestions if permitted and anonymous users can claim items.
admin.wishlist-mode-wishlist-tooltip: Multiple users and multiple lists with claiming and item suggestions. Lists can be made public if permitted by the group.

auth.account-is-not-linked-with-oauth: Your account is not linked with {providerName}. To link your account, sign out and click 'Sign in with {providerName}'.
auth.check-your-email: Check your email and follow the link to reset your password.
auth.contact-admin: Please contact the site administrator to reset your password.
auth.email-is-not-verified-with-the-identity-: Email is not verified with the Identity Provider
auth.email-was-not-provided-by-the-identity-p: Email was not provided by the Identity Provider
auth.enter-email: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
auth.name: Name
auth.your-account-is-currently-linked-with-oa: Your account is currently linked with {providerName}

email.invite-body: You've been invited to join Wishlist! To accept the invitation, click on the link below.
email.invite-fallback-text: Somebody has invited you to join their Wishlist! Follow the link to signup: {url}
email.invite-footer: If you do not wish to join or believe this email to be sent in error, then you can ignore this email.
email.pw-reset-body: If you requested a password reset, click the link below to complete the process. If you didn't make this request, then you can safely ignore this email.
email.pw-reset-fallback-text: Follow the link to reset your password {resetUrl}
email.test-body: If you're reading this, then congratulations! Email configuration seems to have been set up properly!

errors.an-item-must-be-added-to-at-least-one-li: An item must be added to at least one list
errors.cannot-edit-item-that-you-did-not-create: Cannot edit item that you did not create
errors.cannot-unclaim-an-item-you-did-not-claim: Cannot unclaim an item you did not claim
errors.cannot-update-a-claim-that-is-not-yours: Cannot update a claim that is not yours
errors.claimed-by-user-must-be-specified: Claimed by user must be specified
errors.could-not-claim-quantity-items: Could not claim {quantity} items. Only {availableQuantity} available to claim.
errors.create-group-unknown-error: An unknown error occurred while creating the group
errors.email-is-required-for-public-claims: Email is required for public claims
errors.group-is-not-in-registry-mode-cannot-get: Group is not in registry mode. Cannot get a public link
errors.in-registry-mode-you-can-only-have-one-l: In registry mode, you can only have one list
errors.invalid-currency-code: Currency code is invalid. A list of valid currency codes can be found here
errors.invalid-email: Please provide a valid email address.
errors.invite-code-invalid: Invite code is either invalid or already been used
errors.item-id-must-be-a-number: Item id must be a number
errors.must-specify-an-item-to-delete: Must specify an item to delete
errors.must-specify-group-name-in-body: Must specify group name in body
errors.must-specify-url-in-query-parameters: Must specify url in query parameters
errors.no-group-friendly-msg: If you're seeing this page, it's because you aren't in a group yet! Either request a group to join, or create your own.
errors.one-or-more-items-missing-an-id: One or more items missing an id
errors.public-lists-not-allowed: Public lists are not allowed in this group
errors.the-page-you-were-looking-for-wasnt-foun: The page you were looking for wasn't found
errors.unable-to-delete-list: Encountered an error while deleting the list
errors.unable-to-find-product-information: Unable to find product information. You can still fill in the details manually.
errors.user-already-exists: User with username or email already exists
errors.user-is-not-a-member-of-the-group: User is not a member of the group
errors.user-must-be-in-the-correct-group: User must be in the correct group
errors.user-not-in-group: User is not part of this group

general.cannot-delete-default-group-msg: You cannot delete the default group. Please change the default group before deleting this group.
general.choose-language-description: Choose your preferred language for the UI. This setting only applies for you and is persisted across browsers.
general.dont-see-language: Don't see your language here or notice a missing or improper translation? See the docs on how to contribute.
general.enter-user-email: Enter the user's email and select a group for the user to join
general.provide-the-name-of-the-group-below: Provide the name of the group below.
general.search-for-user: Search for a user to add to the group
general.select-user-group: Select a group for the user to join. An invite link will be generated
general.smtp-not-enabled-implication: While email setup is not a requirement, users will not be able to reset their passwords via self-service and you will have to manually send out links to reset passwords.
general.this-invite-link-is-only-valid-for-one-s: This invite link is only valid for one signup

setup.first-account-admin: Your first account will be the administrator. You can always add more admins later.
setup.global-settings-subtext: These settings will be applied to all groups that are created. Some settings may be overrided by individual groups.
setup.invite-users-subtext: If you're ready, invite some additional users! You can always invite users later from the admin or group settings.

wishes.add-a-list-manager-explainer: Search for a user within this group to add as a manager to your list.
wishes.additional-items-requested: {remainingQuantity, plural, =0 {There are no additional items available.} one {There is # additional item available.} other {There are # additional items available.}}
wishes.approval-confirmation: Are you sure you wish to {approve, select, true {approve} other {deny}} this suggestion from {name}
wishes.approval-required: {listOwner} will need to approve your suggestion before it is added to their list.
wishes.approvals-waiting: You have {approvalCount, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} awaiting your approval
wishes.are-you-sure-you-wish-to-delete-item: Are you sure you wish to delete {name}?
wishes.are-you-sure-you-wish-to-delete-item-mul: Do you want to delete {name} from this list or all lists?
wishes.before-you-can-claim-the-item-we-just-ne: Before you can claim the item, we just need one thing from you.
wishes.claimed-info-text: {claimedQuantity, plural, one {You've claimed # item.} other {You've claimed # items.}}
wishes.delete-list-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this list? Any items that are not associated with another list will also be deleted.
wishes.list-managers-tooltip: List managers can do everything you can do including approving or denying suggestions, updating list settings, and removing items from the list. If your group is set to 'surprise' mode, any items added by a list manager will be visible to you.
wishes.purchased-toast: Marked item as {purchased, select, true {purchased} other {not purchased}}
wishes.url-placeholder: Enter a URL to fetch the item data
